posts.title: Vegetable Biryani
posts.recipeDetail: A flavorful rice dish with a variety of mixed vegetables, cooked with aromatic spices and layered to perfection. A wholesome and satisfying meal.

posts.title: Sushi
posts.recipeDetail: Fresh vinegared rice paired with seafood or vegetables, all wrapped in seaweed for a perfect bite-sized treat.

posts.title: Fresh Salad
posts.recipeDetail: A refreshing combination of crisp, fresh vegetables, perfect for a light meal or side dish.

posts.title: Ramen
posts.recipeDetail: A rich and savory noodle soup, typically served with a flavorful broth, meats, and vegetables.

posts.title: Pancake
posts.recipeDetail: Fluffy and golden pancakes, often served with syrup, butter, or fresh fruit for a classic breakfast.

posts.title: Bibimbap
posts.recipeDetail: A vibrant Korean rice bowl topped with assorted vegetables, a fried egg, and spicy gochujang sauce for a perfect balance of flavors.

posts.title: Tofu Salad
posts.recipeDetail: A light and nutritious salad featuring cubes of tofu and a tangy dressing for a satisfying, healthy meal.
